serf.install: wget -vO serf.zip https://dl.bintray.com/mitchellh/serf/0.6.3_linux_amd64.zip && unzip serf.zip && mv serf /usr/local/bin && rm -vf ./serf.zip
serf.run: unset TMP_TAGS; for i in $(set | grep -P "AIRSTACK_TAGS"); do TMP_TAGS="$TMP_TAGS $(echo $i | awk '{print "-tag " tolower($3) "=" tolower($4)}' FS='[_=]')"; done; exec chpst -u root serf agent $TMP_TAGS -tag start_time=`date +%s` -config-dir=/etc/serf/config/ -iface ${AIRSTACK_SERF_IFACE:-eth0} -discover=${AIRSTACK_TAGS_CLUSTERUUID:-airstack}
